content.detailedDescription:
I posted a sighting earlier but now have more time and better perspective to describe what my mother, my skeptic friend and i saw last evening.  my friend is convinced there must be a reasonable, logical (simplest answer is most likely) explaination for what happened.  i and my mother on the other hand are not quite sure.

my mother noted the exact time, but i'd say it was shortly after 8:00 pm on 8/20/2010 that we saw something utterly incredible that lasted well over an hour.  initially i had gone outside to have a cigarette in anticipation of my friends arrival.  upon lighting my cigarette i noticed a faint light that seemed to streak across the sky. as an avid skywatcher i'm very familiar with the goings on in the night sky, especially in the tri-state area. the rear of my house (the deck) faces the west. newark airport is to my south and other major tri-state area airports are obviously toward my east. what we saw however, has nothing to do with planes. after first seeing this faint light i was slightly perplexed.  all of a sudden multiple lights began to appear and reappear all over the western sky above the treeline and "houseline" behind my house.  i'd say over the course of the sighting there were anywhere from 6-12 seperate lights. these lights, although a significant distance away, were something that shocked me.  i had never seen anything like them.  

planes were traveling across the sky. in contrast to these planes, the objects were moving at incredible speeds...Speeds that, as far as i know, are inhumanly possible.  i'd estimate thousands of miles per hour. i can estimate these incredible speeds due to the known limited speed of commercial airliners. furthermore, these objects were moving in many different directions. i mean right angles, reversing direction "on a dime", vertically, horizontally, etc. during a sparing few instances these white lights would seemingly flash a red or orange hue as well. i would describe their movements; as if in a dogfight seemingly interacting with eachother at times. mind you, all the while planes are traveling through the sky. 

this activity lasted for over an hour and probably significantly longer, but i had left to meet with friends at a local bar. i can say with complete and utter confidence that these lights were not; planes, helicopters, blimps (they move way too slowly and most likely don't travel at night as far as i know), spotlights,drones, flares, or any other craft civlian or military that i have ever seen, read about or heard of in any capacity whatsoever. i can say this due to the astonishing capabilities these possible "craft" displayed. 

in addition, these lights disappeared and reappeared during their amazing acrobatics. i mean they were there and then not and then there again...All over the sky traveling multiple directions, at times crossing paths and seemingly chasing each other.

truly a once in a lifetime experience.  i am still in a state of awe and would love to hear if anyone else has any information on this.  i know mufon follows up on reports and i highly suggest calling tri-state area airports and/or faa officials (as well as local military bases) for reports made by personell and airline pilots between the hours of 7pm-11pm.  something strange was definitely occuring last night and someone else must have reported this event, seeing as how it was not very latein the evening .  please get back to me about any information you obtain. i am very curious about what my mother and i witnessed. 

as far as photographs are concerned, i do have hd photos that show some strange "streaks" when fully zoomed in.  my photos were taken with a canon rebel t1i eos digital camera.  unfortunately for me, windows and ie do not read .Mov files (common digital camera file). this means i would have to convert these photos into a seperate file and video format thus losing the quality of the images when uploaded to the internet rendering them completely useless.  these photos however, have points of reference.  in said photos are two neighbors houses, trees, stars and even passing planes and (when fully zoomed) show (at multiple lengths of exposure) that these "streaks" are neither planes nor stars.  how do i know this? at a 10" exposure the planes are obvious in nature, the stars are "solid", and the "streaks" cover a much greater distance than that of either the planes or stars.  if you (investigators) would like these photos feel free to contact me any time day or night and i will gladly provide them to you in any form you see fit.  although, you may need a mac computer to read them in their current form. thank you for your time...
content.summary: Covey of ufos in "dog fight."

content.detailedDescription: We were swimming down at nelson's landing which is on lake mojave. we were floating around looking at the stars. my sister noticed 4 objects moving in the sky. as we watched, 2 objects appeared to fly away from earth and while the one of the other objects sped up to join the other object and they flew away on an easterly trajectory. i watch the stars often, but have never seen a satellite exhibit any erratic behavior like i seen last night, nor have i ever seen one match the speed these objects had. unfortunately we were swimming and didn't have a camera handy.
content.summary: 4 high flying objects appeared similar to how satelites in orbit, except speed was much too fast and non orbital motion was shown.

content.detailedDescription:
Today, friday august the 20th. 2010 i went to the beach with my daughter, i live at tijuana beaches just south of imperial beach california -->(important data). first pair of objects appeared about 12:34 san diego time, i know because i saw my mobile phone time; those were cigar shaped or maybe circular but as we saw them on a side perspective they appeared elongated with this particular glow by day. these objects traveled from west to east disappearing on the upper atmosphere eastbound, in other words the objects appeared over the sea about half a mile up and traveled east about 30 to 40 seconds to disappear above the upper atmosphere. the objects started to appear at that particular time on pairs sometimes three at most. i tried to spot them over the sea level wondering if they could come out of the sea water, but no, it seemed mostly they entered the atmosphere or suddenly appear at that particular height and traveled the mentioned path.  about 5 to 6 months ago, my wife, her brother, my daughter and me were walking on the hills 3 miles south of the california border, this is south of san diego county on tijuana soil and spotted the same type of objects but closer, about 300 yards of where we were standing, they showed a yellowish glow it was about 5 pm and my brother in-law tried to photograph them both with his cell phone camera but couldn't be found within the picture taken.
a very particular and attention calling circumstance is that on imperial beach and the whole san diego county there are many radars because of the bases located within u.S. soil, this is north of the border, but this objects seem to "know" they shouldn't fly over the u.S. side of the aerial space so they do their hole showing on the mex. side of the border.Quite close to u.S. boundaries.
as i wrote the objects they appeared in pairs or three at most some times just one and did the same flying path until they quit the heaven, so i counted about 23 on the elapsed time of 1 hour and 10 minutes, this was from 12:34 till 1:45 pm. i'm  building a house on the mentioned hill 3 miles away from the u.S. border and my family and me have spotted different type of ufos daytime and night time, sometimes i believe i can spot them so often because there is a japanese owned speaker factory that makes speakers for many brands so they might have lots of magnetic devices to make the speakers (maybe). this is my first mufon report, but this one i had to write it because is the first time i see so much ufos on just one day, the most i've seen over here before this sight were about 7 on a v-shaped formation traveling the opposite path: east to west.
i do declare this to be truth.
[name deleted/cms/tg]
content.summary: I was at the beach with daughter & we watched this ufos in an elapsed time of 70 mins. & counted about 23.

content.detailedDescription: I'll report a more detailed description later but i must say it's like nothing i've ever seen. a covey of about half a dozen to a dozen ufos' are making incredible maneuvers across the sky at incredible speeds in what apeears to be a dogfight pattern. traveling thousands of miles an hour in presence of planes to the west of new york. witnessed by me, my mother, and my friend ( a non-believer).  i'm fascinated impressed and perpplexed.  someone else must have reported this. i put the duration at 1hr. 20 mins but it is still going on! who knows how long it was last.  i'll do more skywatching later.  i'm sure th faa and pilots must have reported these objects.  be back later for a more detailed report. please follow up this is an incredible sighting. it is not spotlights, planes, helicopters or any other known object or machine i can think of.  i just don't know what elsee to say. anyone else see this!? i attempted to take video and photos with my canon rebel t1i but they are either too far away or for some other  reason, they do not show up on camera!
content.summary: Covey of star like ufo's in "dog fight"

content.detailedDescription:
I was lying on a bench outside of my house waiting to go out with some friends. i noticed a triangular delta shaped pattern of four lights approximately 5 degrees or so in apparent size passing overhead at the zenith. i didn't have much time to think about it but i believe that it blocked out the stars as it passed by. i watched the pattern fly along it's symmetry axis extremely rapidly. it crossed from the zenith to the local skyline which here is about 30 degrees up or so as we are at the bottom of a hill where it passed out of view. it flew much faster than the large jetliners which fly a similar approach path into san jose. 

what really struck me about it was that it was absolutely silent, meaning it would have had to be extremely high or if a low flying aircraft be extremely quiet. if it was a formation of low earth orbiting satellites it was remarkable in the fact that it would have that particular arrangement, and it shouldn't have blocked out the stars. if it was some sort of experimental airship, i imagine it should be much noisier if it was flying low enough to appear that large and move that rapidly. it did not appear to display any other unusual characteristics other than it's apparent size and rapidity, nor did it deviate from an apparently straight flight path. 

this was my first and only ufo experience. as a professional scientist, a longtime amateur astronomer, and licensed pilot, i honestly never expected to see one. i remember being unnerved enough by it's appearance that i stood up and watched it as it flew, thinking that finally, i had seen something that had at least the tiniest possibility of being extraterrestrial. i remember a feeling of awe, humility, and curiosity at the same time. although to this day i don't know what i saw, it gives me hope that the truth *might* be out there, after all.
content.summary: Triangular formation of lights

content.detailedDescription: All i know that it was a round shaped looking object and it was on a route in sierraville in the middle of nowhere. i was driving after my friends left at around 1am and i had no idea why but i wanted to drive to sierraville. there is nothing in sierraville but farm land that is surrounded by mountains in a valley. i didn't even see it coming. all i know is that it appeared almost overhead of me and i saw a blinding light which caused me to stop. my car stalled but probably because i drive stick shift and stalled. problem is that i couldn't start up again and i quickly looked at the clock and it read around 4:01am. and that's all i remember. i remember waking up and seeing that time was 4:18am. i lost 17 minutes. i doubt i was abducted but noticed that there was a house nearby. i think i was a witness to an abduction over there. i have no injuries or strange things poking around my neck or nose. but i can tell you that i was unconscious for 17 minutes. when i got home back to truckee i went to bed and now when i think about it, i don't even know how i got home. i can recall all driving routes that i always take but this time i have forgotten. i'm going back out there but this time armed with cameras and a crew.
content.shape: Circle,   Disc,   Egg,   Oval,   Sphere,   Other,   Unknown
content.summary: I didn't see it till it was too late.

content.detailedDescription: It was a very clear, calm sunday night, with sky visibility celling at 30,000 feet or above.  i was sitting on the front porch observing the night sky when i noticed various star patterns.  one pattern directly in my line of sight were "3 stars" at about an altitude of 12 to 15,000 feet.  these lights were similar in shape, color, brightness and were level and fixed in the sky in a straight line.  no clouds or atmospheric interference was present.  i then observed what i thought to be a star, the left one of the (3) slowly and constantly rose from a stationary point up northward.  i stood up and watched as it rose out of sight.  there were no strobe lights, beacons, sounds or color other than what appeared to look like a star.  this was not a plane balloon, helicopter, flare or lighter than air raft.
content.summary: Star like object ascends in the night sky.

content.detailedDescription: i went outside to smoke as i do everymorning with my dog and while outside normally sit and look around. this morning it was a clear blue sky over head not a cloud in sight. i saw what appeared as an object moving in the sky out of the corner of my eye. looked over and what i saw for about a full 4 minutes if not longer was a white cylinderical object moveing in an oddly way. seemed to look as if it was gliding threw the air. no sounds and no this was not a plane or blimp. i am sure of this as i could clearly see itin very good detail it had no back tail like a plane or wings. basically what it look like was a tube shaped object. it was solid white same as a ciggeratte if you were to cut off the filter. exactly the same. expect this was i would say estimating the distances much larger then a 747. it also had no nose shape in the front and there was no noise with the object it passed behind a tree at the same time it hit the roof section i saw it turn and head north. i ran back inside the house and headed to the front were i was sure to get a much better look at the object at that point but by the time i got there it was gone. when i first noticed it i thought it was a plane but the longer i look at it the more i noticed the detail of it and the movement was more like a balloon then a plane. but the ends on both sides where flat like a cut tube it would not make since for a balloon to have such a sharp cut on both ends.
content.summary: While in the backyard i saw a white cylindrical object slowly moving in se direction.

content.detailedDescription: [link moved to additional evidence section/cms/tg]
content.summary: 3rd sighting not sure what it is (video).

content.detailedDescription: Was inside the house, went outside as the sun was starting to set to have a cigarette. as i look up i see a red flash streak the sky. this was not a shooting star i said to myself. so as i look up, i then see (2) very bright objects in the sky to the left of where i saw the red streak. i noticed they were sitting very low and very still..I watched it straight for 20 minutes with some recording here and there..Then 1 light remained as i stayed and observed for a little over 2 hours and the object was still there until i decided to go inside the house to search the internet to see if there was any talk of our visitor...At first i thought this could either be a orbiting satellite (then i said no, because it was really low), a very bright star (looked too big for a star, and if im not mistaken, i could have sworn the object would rotate colors)...My general feeling after witnessing a once in a lifetime experience was, is the world gonna end? and if it were in fact a ufo, wouldn't airspace controllers be the first to extract a team to access and observe the situation in the skies. lots of theories...
content.summary: Bright light that interchanged colors hovered for hours then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was just getting out of the car after a trip to pick my son up from work. i was watching the sky because after seeing an orange orb on july 4th of this year, i guess i just started looking more. i saw a soundless light that didn't look like a star. it hovered and then moved swiftly a short distance. i went inside to grab the camera, hoping the batteries weren't dead and came back to film this light. there appeared to be flashes of light coming from the base of it. i zoomed in and it looked like 2 orange orbs fused together, again with a rotating, flashing light at the bottom. i thought to myself, "why me? seeing 2 in one year, let alone a lifetime!" it was still in the sky when i went inside to view my video of it. when i came back out 30 minutes later it was gone. i saw 2 planes flying in the sky and they didn't look like what i had seen.
content.summary: A hovering light that had bright flashes at the base, suddenly moved very fast and stopped again to hover. i grabbed the camera and when i zoomed in it appeared to be 2 orange balls fused together, again with some rotating flashing light at the base.

content.detailedDescription: It was 8/18/10 at 10 pm exactly, i saw a large orb of light, yellow orange in color.  it was joined by four more lights two minutes later.  when all five lights were out, i went in to call my girlfriend.  i went back out and some of the lights were shutting down.  i called 911 and asked for luke afb and was told i could not have that number (?).  she explained she would contact the right authorities.  i was still outside and within five minutes all the lights shut off within seconds of each other.  twenty minutes later the lights (7) went on at south mountain.  all kinds of aircraft was in the vicinity.  i was facing south.  these lights looked like the phoenix lights in 1997.  i had five friends over and asked them to look and when they did the lights started to disappear.  these lights lasted for at least 10 minutes and they came back on in about twenty minutes.  the neighborhood dogs barked for no reason all night.
content.summary: Looking south on central and saw one large orb of light and four more showed up.

content.detailedDescription:
At 9:54 pm i was lying on my back on the roof of our house watching the perseid meteor shower when i saw a small red point of light coming from the northwest by north (basically from the direction of san francisco) and heading in a straight line (almost directly overhead) towards the southeast by east at about 1/3 the speed of most meteor strikes (maybe a little faster, but not more than 1/2 the speed of a typical meteor strike), but a little while before it disappeared into the horizon (and obscured by a tree) it swerved to one side (the west side of it's path) then back to the path it was going along (the swerve was perhaps a bit larger than the moon - it wasn't just my eyes playing tricks on me, and watching it as it went through the swerve was quite fascinating as seeing an object do that in the sky at a high rate of speed is a rarity, and because i was able to tell that its change of path did indeed cause it to take longer to get to its destination [it did not change its speed at any time, as far as i could tell - just the direction of travel] [if it was just my eyes twitching to one side and back i likely would not have observed the additional time it took to make that swerve, plus i could see the shadow of trees in the background at that time so i would likely have noticed any movement caused by my eyes]). in all it took that object about 4 seconds to travel from the top of my vision (i was lying down with my head to the north) to when my sight of it was blocked by a tree. it was also quite high up so it would have to have been traveling quite fast (planes are likely to take about three minutes to travel that far across the sky at a high altitude), and it didn't make any noise. my first thought was it was a slow, red meteor strike as that's what it looked like (similar size, altitude, and brightness), but it went all the way across the sky (which i've never seen a meteor strike do [and which is made to be quite an unlikely event to see even if it occurs when considering the amount of light pollution where i live], and satellites move a whole lot slower than this did and are usually white and change in intensity as they travel across the sky), and the swerve was the most impressive part of it. i do believe the swerve was the shape of a half-circle, but i cannot be 100% certain as it was moving fast (i was closely following it with my eyes at the time and clearly able to see it when it swerved though). i can confidently say that the swerve did not have any straight lines to it. and i had been out in the dark for 50 minutes prior to seeing this object so my eyes should have been fairly well adjusted to the darkness. i did have a video camera running at the time (on a tripod, and i was paying little attention to it as there wouldn't be enough time to point it anything), but it's not sensitive enough to pick up any stars without reducing the shutter speed so much that a lot of motion is lost, and it didn't pick up any light from this object (if its field of view was wide enough considering that it was pointed to the side of the object's path).

if you look at the first link below (not mine) there are a number of photographs of meteor strikes, and the one in the second link is the same color as what i saw and seems to be of a similar brightness in comparison to good meteor strikes (and it's worth pointing out that the object in that picture doesn't fade in and fade out at the beginning and end of the streak like the meteor strikes do in all of the other pictures he took). (if the links aren't available to you search flickr for 'orionid meteor wednesday' and see the one taken on 10/20/09 along with the others in that set for comparison.):
*(links moved to additional evidence section below--sgonzalez/cms).

if anyone else sees or has seen anything like this please submit a report.
content.summary: Red light streaked across the sky then swerved during the perseid meteor shower.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving west down larpenteur ave from maplewood to roseville and when we approached dale street we saw a object on near to the horizon in the low sunlight possibly reflecting light.  we thought it was a plane at first or a really bright planet on the horizon (which seemed unlikely), but it held its position, and at times got brighter or bigger and then dimmer or smaller.  it was just to the right of the road, but way off in the distance.  as we drove down the road and passed lexington, another light joined it in the sky that one was smaller and lower and to the right of the first object.  the second object had the same properties to the first and also seemed to pulsate extremely slowly.  the second object disappeared shortly after it appeared, and by the time we reached snelling ave, both objects were gone seemingly getting smaller or more distant until they disappeared but constantly holding their position from our vantage point.
content.summary: Reflective object on the horizon.

content.detailedDescription: I was on vacation this past week in ohau, hawaii. we visited the arizona memorial on august 10, 2010 between the hours of 8:00 and 9:00 a.M. the photos were taken between 8:30 and 9:00 a.M. on the boat returning from the memorial. i didn't see the object while i was shooting the pics and was both surprised and pleased to see it this evening while i was uploading the vacation pics from my camera to my computer.
content.summary: Daytime orb, oahu, hawaii, 8-10-10Ã¾

content.detailedDescription: (reporting this for a friend who wishes to remain completely anonymous).  he was walking outside on the north side of a building on lake street and chicago ave in south minneapolis, mn.  looked up to the sky and saw what he thought to  be a ufo.  it was a white light barely bigger than the stars around it.  it made a small u-shaped path through the sky and then disappeared out of the atmosphere. he laughed at the event.
content.summary: Quick event.

content.detailedDescription: I was doing a triathlon with my xc team, and i was in the biking proportion. as i was going on the path, i looked to my right, the east, and in the sky there was a cigar shaped ufo. and i could not stare at it because other people were using the bike path, and i wanted to win for my team. but when i did look back, it wasn't there, and it was all the way on the west part of the sky. then it vanished. it actually seemed like it sped away, as opposed to dissapearing. but whatever it did, it was fast. i k now it was not a plane, for a fact. and it was not moving, it was stationary, but when i looked back, it obviously moved very fast to the west half of the sky. i was kind of frightened, but at the same time i was intrigued.
content.summary: Short cigar shaped gray oval. during the day so i don't know if it had lights.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving, looking nw in direction of table mountain, around noon (no longer remember exact date).  weather was sunny and warm.  i saw 3 white spheres traveling nw over table mountain. they were flying very low, very slow, constant speed.  they were very widely spaced apart in a triangular formation.  they were identical in appearance and traveled at identical speed.  at first i wondered if they were planes, but they were not plane-shaped.  also, their speed, elevation, formation seemed to rule them out as planes.  i can't see why planes would be doing that.  also, they were close to nrel.  since that is federal govt property, i don't know why multiple small planes would be allowed at low elevation there.  
note:  i live in area, and have seen lots of small planes, military helicopters, and of course the paragliders on top of lookout mtn.  these objects were not like any of those. also, they were travelling pretty much nw in a route that i have not seen planes/helicopters take.
i kept watching them as i drove, since i was driving in that direction.  their speed, elevation, formation and appearance seemed unusual to me.  i lost sight of them when they kept traveling nw and were eventually blocked from view by table mountain. 
the objects were spherical, whitish, and somewhat shiny (metallic).  there were no lights, no wings, no landing gear, no copter blades, or other features apparent.  
i thought about taking a picture with my camera phone, but i knew the objects were too far away, would not have shown up. 
i didn't report it right until now.  i have seen other ufos, other unknown things, and have had some unexplainable experiences.  i have reported ufo sitings to mufon before, who responded with a great professional attitude.  but my friends and family just laugh at me.  that makes me depressed and feel like i shouldn't bother reporting things.  but i decided to report this.  unfortunately i no longer remember the exact time or date.
also, there was lots of traffic around at the time (lunch-hour traffic), sunny skies, and they were very visible.  i wonder if anyone else noticed them.
content.summary: 3 white spheres traveling nw over table mountain  in golden.

content.detailedDescription: This photo was taken in the morning. i didnt see anything at the time. once i was looking through the photos did i notice something strange in the sky. you can see it is a ufo and even has glass window (dome).
content.summary: Ufo in a clear sky.

content.detailedDescription:
My family is on a beach vacation to navarre beach florida.  last night my brother-in-law, my wife, and i were sitting on the back balcony watching the night sky and talking.  kevin my brother-in-law and i spotted some airplanes that were flying in circles. there were four of them in total but they were split into 2 groups.  they would follow each other in huge patterns accross half of the sky. this was one of the planes that was to my left front the other plane appeared to just stop i can only assume that it started flying away from us but we could still see the light on it.  the other plane that was with it started to circle by its self but it was moving alot faster then it was before. 

where it get crazy is we hear a muffled boom noise over and over again about about 30 secs  apart then we hear a quick 3 of the same noise instead of just one and it repeats for about 10 mins. while this is going on kevin was looking in the other direction my wife and i seen a red ball fall out of the sky in the direction of the airbase. this is where the one airplane "stopped" moving and the other one put it in overdrive.  i tell kevin and he turns around and about that time we see 8 more red balls fall out of the sky.  

what we seen is multiple red balls with defined edges falling so fast that it appeared to have a blur behind it.  they disappeared when behind clouds and reappeared and then disappeared or hit the ground far away from us they could had went into the horizon or hit the ground or ocean far away. each one lasted about 3 sec and were one after the other and some fell at the same time.  the first one fell from left to right and the rest fell from right to left all seemed to be heading in the same direction. they started about halfway through the sky out of nowhere.  the first one fell and there was a few seconds before the others started to fall.

i just knew that the base was under attack because i thought that they were bombs or missiles being shot at the base but there were not any noises after they "hit".  i never have seen a bomb or missiles so i don't know what they look like.  after the red balls fell all but one of the planes went off the one that appeared to stay still went out of site and the other one just kept on flying the same routine it had before for a little while longer then it went off and we couldn't see it any more.  

we don't know what we seen but we are hoping that someone else that seen them and may know what they were and could shed some light on this for us.  i will be back on my balcony tonight to see if it happens again.
content.summary: Red balls of light fall

content.detailedDescription:
I was traveling west on u.S. highway 2 from poplar to wolf point, montana at approximately 4:30 a.M. i can't remember the exact date now, but it was still dark. i was commuting to my job at the time.I was the only car on the road at the time.

as i drove along, i noticed a red light in the distance ahead of me. it looked out of place and at first i thought it was the tail lights of a car.I nixed that idea because the red light seemed to be too high up to be tail lights. i then thought it might be the trailer lights on a semi-truck. i also nixed that idea because i realized it was only 1 light.

it suddenly hit me for some reason that it was a ufo, because it was so strange. i suddenly got a feeling of excitement and i was quite happy at the thought of seeing a ufo. 

as i got closer to the ufo, i kept thinking to myself, "please don't fly off. i want to get up to you and see you". i didn't speed up or slow down, because i was afraid if i did, it would suddenly fly away.

finally, i came up on the ufo and stopped approximately 15 to 20 feet from it. the ufo was approximately 10 to 12 feet in the air. i felt i could have gotten even closer, but i was afraid if i did it would take off.

the whole area was lit up in a red light that was emitting from the craft. it wasn't a bright light, but rather a soft light. it was so surreal. the light wasn't coming from something like aircraft lights, but rather it seemed to be emitting from the outer shell of it.

try as i might, i couldn't see the craft itself, only the red light and what appeared to be a dark center. i started getting frustrated that i couldn't see the ufo, so i really concentrated and squinted my eyes at it. finally i could make out the left hand side of it. i had to look through the light to see it. 

it appeared to be an oval shape about the length and height of a car. i remember thinking that there couldn't have been more than 2 occupants in it. the craft was perfectly suspended in the air without any hint of wavering. there was no sound and no apparent signs of propulsion.  

after staring at it for a few minutes, it suddenly dropped down to only a few inches above the ground. i believe the craft was a gray color at this time. it seems to me it had a wide belt around its middle and it had raised ribs with a possibility of what looked like nuts and bolts on the ribs. there were no apparent windows or doors of any kind. 

it then slowly took off to my left and down through a gully. i remember seeing its red light shining off the ground under it. the craft never wavered from its distance from the ground. if the ground rose, it rose. if the ground dropped, it dropped.

when it got down to the bottom of the gully, the land opens up into a wide, flat stretch. this is when the ufo suddenly accelerated to a high speed and was into the horizon in only a couple of seconds. it left a trail behind it that reminded me of a tracer bullet. even though it was traveling very fast, i had the impression it wasn't even trying to go fast. it came to an abrupt and immediate dead stop when it make it to the hills in the horizon.
it then slowly floated off to the west, following the hills in the horizon. 

i sat there watching it for a couple of minutes when another car came up over the hill heading east from wolf point to poplar. i was on top of the hill and a ways back. i now realize the ufo had dropped down and went down the gully, because it didn't want the other car to see it. i have no idea if the other car had seen anything at all. when the car went by me i just stared at it and it kept going. they must have seen something, but not like i did.

the whole experience was totally surreal. i was never scared the whole time and i was quite excited and happy. i often wonder why the ufo let me get up to it and look at like that. could it have somehow read my mind and felt nice to me? 

as a side note: a month or two later i was riding with my parents from wolf point back to poplar. a bunch of cars were parked out in the burrow pit and a bunch of people were looking at tule creek, which is down the hill from where i saw the ufo. i asked what were all those people doing there as it was quite unusual. my father than said he heard people talking about a ufo landing in the cat tails in tule creek. sure enough, there was an imprint in the cat tails that would have been the shape and size of what i had seen

i never seen the craft again. it still haunts my memory every day. i couldn't tell you what it was, but i believe it was not of this earth.
content.summary: 15 to 20 feet from ufo that started out at 10 to feet up and then it dropped to a few inches above ground.

content.detailedDescription: I was loading some photos off my digital onto my computer and the photos of a arc looking cloud that i took a picture of.Upon looking closely at one of the photos i noticed a object in the picture.The object is above the arc looking cloud.After enlarging the object it does not appear to be a normal aircraft of any type.I do not know how to even explain its appearance.It looks to be about the size of a small plane,silver in color with a yellow tint on the underside.It might be a military aircraft but it does not appear to have any wings and it does not appear to be symmetrical.This happened in july of 2010 approximately.I am not sure because i just was taking a picture of this strange cloud at the time and i did not even notice this object until a month later when i was downloading some other pictures onto my computer.
content.summary: I was looking at my camera photos a month later and noticed strange object next to strange arc cloud.

content.detailedDescription: Call met at *(telephone number deleted--sgonzalez/cms) and i`ll give you all the run down. called reno atc today the 17 th, and they have nothing on radar at that time  from 10:06- 10:00. duration of sighting 4 four min. i`m a piolet and althogh not current i do understand night flying. it had (2) observiation windows in the craft one was red and the other green. thank you very much. i`m not crazy and i have drawn what i have seen. would love to fax it to you. thank`s.  #1,taking my dog`s out to night time potty in my back yard. 2, the bright light coming towards me with some changes of intensity. 3. i thought it was an a/c intersepting the reno ils system as they usually do to turn to their left for 16 left or 16 right. object was disk like with irratic motion`s of down to the ridge line then up higher that original altitude the back to center then right then left back to center then gone. all these manuvers were much to fast for a chopper or regular a/c. 5, i was not affraid and today i feel lucky. 6,it just was gone vanished.
content.summary: Bright light in sky in the east over spanish springs area. by sparks nevada. caught my eye at 10:06 pm and was heading toward me. it went up down back to center then right and then left. went into my house got my binoculars steady myself and saw a disk.

content.detailedDescription:
The first object was west of my location and the other was southwest. the western object appeared much closer since it was brighter. both objects were similar in that they were flashing reds, greens, and whites. they moved very slowly towards the west away from my location. i was able to get great footage of these objects. i was able to capture roof angles, tree lines, and was even able to film an airplane landing at dfw with the southwestern object in the background. 

i have seen and recorded these star like objects in the past, but this was the first time that i saw 2 of them in clear view. i've created a detailed video and posted on youtube. these objects were shot with a sony hi-def camera. i captured about 30 minutes worth of footage. what is posted are the highlights.

[link moved to additional evidence section/cms/tg]
content.summary: 2 star-like objects in n. texas near dfw, filmed for 30 mins

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were watching tv in our bedroom when our oldest son came in and told us to look outside at the sky.We got up and went out onto our balcony to see several, maybe 8-10 aircraft with extremely bright strobing lights on them.They were north of us flying extremely fast from east to west. then once nearly out of sight they turned and came back towards the east. when flying from east to west we witnessed a bright red light ahead of the conventional aircraft. at one point the red light made an abrupt and complete stop and then changed directions flying back in the direction it came from. the other aircraft made their turns and began following. we lost sight of them , then within 30 seconds or so a triangle shaped object with a deep red light in the center came flying directly overhead from the direction the jets left in, followed minutes later by the group of jets again. the triangle shaped object made no sound as it flew overhead, yet we could hear the conventional aircraft as they flew by. over the next several minutes the aircraft continued to maneuver around the airspace near the city at extreme speeds, my wife , son and myself all witnessed changes in speed (including full stops), direction and altitude which are not possible with currently known technologies. after 30-45 minutes the aircraft all flew over the horizon.

this is not our first sighting here in lake havasu city. we had a very similar experience in may of this year, still my first thought was to try and rationalize the aircraft as being of a conventional nature. the feelings were excitement, fear and frustration at not knowing exactly what it was we were seeing.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Boomerang shaped craft making dramatic turns at extreme speeds.

content.detailedDescription: about 10:30 tonight went out to water the lawn facing the eastern sky was the light bluish object in the sky stood out as i continued to watch it it very slowly started to move my direction westerdly stop stay slightly back slightly forward. then it started to move east climed in altitude then stated to really become active would rise lower forward backward side to side was really acting weird then at one point the light of the thing went out. it went out then after three or four minutes it flicked on then go off maybe for a minute or two the it was a steay flickering then it stayed on started moving again came down close to where it was going to be where i was going to lose sight of it the back up it looked like it was over the other end of town maybe two to three miles away. its really hard to be sure how far it was but when it would lower it self it was brighter in all i watched it for a good twenty minutes i'm sure there had to be witnesses that saw what i saw the color of it alone made it stand out then ther movements very active.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: It was a light bluish color could not see the shape of it.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to the store and saw about seven bright lights in the north sky ranging in size. at first i thought they were airplanes but i know airplanes cant be that close together. they were all moving around but staying in the same general area of the sky and i was thinking maybe they were helicopters looking at an accident maybe, but they were too high in the sky. then as i kept driving some went away. then i went to a hill to watch them and there were two, and they stood still for about ten minuets, and i thought they weere just telephone poles. then the one on the left got very big and bright, then the light got really small and started flying away to the rightand it really freaked me out. about three minuets after the first light started moving the other light started to follow it, and they both dissapeared in the distance.
content.summary: There were about seven bright lights in the sky sitting still then one by one started moving away.

content.detailedDescription: At approximatly 8:05,just past dusk my wife and i were out front of our house(which faces west).We were playing with two of our grand children,i was pointing out different aircraft in the sky to my grandson,when i looked north high in the sky what looked like a starlike object or very bright light about as bright as venus.It seemed to be coming straight down at us then it just changed course and reversed.But was real strange it looked like some kind of propulsion system that emmited a cone shaped mist propelling it the other way into space.Now as i said before my house faces west i"ve seen rockets launched from vandeberg,this reminded me of a rocket stage separation.But heres were it really gets weird about ten minutes later almost in the same exact spot in the sky it happens again!The same exact way.Now i know the perseid meteor shower peaked last week these were no meteors.
content.summary: 2 events about 1 minute each.

content.detailedDescription:
I was out on my balcony skywatching,as now that i am retired, i tend to be a bit of night person. it was an exceptionally clear night, quite windy, and any clouds were quickly blown away. my balcony faces north. i was looking at a group of stars almost directly above, but slightly north. i was using a set of high powered field glasses/ binoculars.
i noticed a silver disc shaped object move away from the star cluster and fly for a short bit going east. it then stopped, and sat still for a few seconds after which it changed direction by about 45 degrees and headed in a mostly north/north east direction. i thought, at first,that it may be a satellite, but realized quickly that they do not stop, change direction or leave orbit. when i moved the field glasses away from my eyes i could not see it, so it was far enough out that it could only be seen with them. after several seconds it flew out of sight, straight out. i felt as though it was 'scouting' or searching for something.
at this point i must tell you that this is not the first time i have seen a 'ufo'. i am sixty years old now, and have had several of these encounters, the first one being when i was 15 years old. the subsequent ones were incidents where the crafts got so close that i could easily see the shape, size, lights, etc. i must say, however, that at no point did i feel uneasy or scared. quite the opposite, in fact. i do have them logged, but sadly, only as as afterthought, so the specific time and date were only as close as i could remember.Luckily, i do remember what i was doing each time, so the dates are fairly close to the actual. i must add that every time i always had another witness with me, but not the same one for every incident. i would welcome any queries, as i have never before made any official reports. thank you for taking the time to read this.
content.summary: Saw object flying west to east, stop for few seconds, then change direction and fly out.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the southwest end of las vegas heading west on russell road at i-215.  as i was stopped at a rather long traffic signal, i noticed that there was only one small, normal-looking cumulus cloud in the western sky against the hills of red rock canyon.  i donï¿½ï¿½ï¿½t know why i kept staring at that cloud, but maybe i was bored.  after about 10 seconds of noticing it, the ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½cloudï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ began to do some truly amazing things that iï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ve never seen a cloud do before.

the cloud started out looking rounded and puffy just like a small, normal-looking cumulus cloud.  but it suddenly started to slowly elongate itself from left to right until it became a skinny, sausage-shaped cloud (and this was not a windy day.)  this change in shape happened over the course of about a minute.  then this sausage-shaped cloud started rapidly collapsing in on itself to form an abnormally round ball-shaped cloud.  when it was a perfect white circle, it continued to keep shrinking until it suddenly disappeared.  the entire transformation that i saw probably took place over no more than two and a half minutes total.  when this cloud disappeared, there was nothing in the air in that direction, and visibility was very good.

by the way, before and after the above-mentioned event, i saw no planes, helicopters, or any kind of objects other than the weird cloud on that bright, sunny afternoon.  this was definitely not a vapor trail either.

i was reminded of a remark that a ufologist (whose name i canï¿½ï¿½ï¿½t remember right now) said on one of my ufo/government coverup dvds.  he mentioned that if you ever see an otherwise clear daylight sky with only one cloud in it, you can bet that itï¿½ï¿½ï¿½s a ufo.  after seeing this particular cloud, i think he was right!
content.summary: Possible ufo  hiding in a
